title: NVIDIA Earnings Smash Expectations: AI Demand Shows No Signs of Slowing
description: NVIDIA reported quarterly revenue of $28.5 billion, beating Wall Street estimates by $2 billion. Data center revenue grew 93% year-over-year as AI infrastructure spending accelerates globally.

title: S&P 500 Hits New All-Time High as Tech Rally Extends
description: The S&P 500 index reached a new record high above 6,200 as technology stocks continue to lead market gains. Investors are optimistic about AI-driven productivity improvements across sectors.

title: Bitcoin Breaks $98,000 as Institutional Adoption Accelerates
description: Bitcoin surged past $98,000 this week as major financial institutions announce new crypto custody services. Spot Bitcoin ETFs saw record inflows of $2.3 billion in the past week alone.

title: Apple Intelligence rollout expands to 12 new countries
description: Apple announced expansion of its AI features to new markets including India, Brazil, and South Korea. The company reports 85% of iPhone 15 Pro users have activated Apple Intelligence features.

title: Tesla Unveils Next-Gen Robotaxi: $25,000 Price Target
description: Tesla showcased its fully autonomous robotaxi with a targeted launch in Q3 2026. The vehicle is expected to cost $25,000 and could disrupt ride-sharing markets. Pre-orders open next month.

title: Fed Signals Patience on Rate Cuts Amid Strong Labor Market
description: Federal Reserve officials indicated they are in no rush to cut interest rates as the labor market remains resilient. Markets are now pricing in only two rate cuts for 2026, down from four.

title: Microsoft Azure AI Revenue Grows 127% Year-Over-Year
description: Microsoft reported exceptional growth in its AI-powered cloud services. Azure OpenAI Service now has over 100,000 enterprise customers, driving cloud revenue to new records.

title: Oil Prices Surge to $85/Barrel on Middle East Tensions
description: Crude oil jumped 4% this week as geopolitical tensions in the Middle East raise supply concerns. Energy stocks are outperforming as analysts upgrade price targets for Exxon and Chevron.

title: Amazon Web Services Launches Quantum Computing Service
description: AWS announced Braket Quantum Pro, making quantum computing accessible to enterprise customers. The service could revolutionize drug discovery, financial modeling, and logistics optimization.

title: Housing Market Shows Signs of Cooling as Mortgage Rates Hover at 7%
description: Home sales declined 12% month-over-month as mortgage rates remain elevated. Analysts predict a buyer's market emerging in Q2 2026, with prices expected to soften in major metros.
